Name: Pannenkoekenhuis Candela
Review Text: A very delicious place to eat. They have a wide variety if delicious crepes to choose from. They also have a chocolate shop there you can shop at. I highly recommend making a stop there.

Name: Pannenkoekenhuis Candela
Review Text: came here for brunch and the poffertjes and pancakes were amazing! the service was incredible and made our experience great. a must try!

Name: Pannenkoekenhuis Candela
Review Text: Delicious food. The mini pancakes with strawberries tasted great. Would definitely come again.

Name: Pannenkoekenhuis Candela
Review Text: Very very delicious pannekoeken...we have ordered with cheese, mushrooms and other tasty ingredients... MAKE A VISIT!

Name: Pannenkoekenhuis Candela
Review Text: Went for the pancakes, thought I had walked into the wrong shop when I saw all the chocolate! Pancake was great, lovely rich iced coffee too.

Name: Pannenkoekenhuis Candela
Review Text: The folks here are so accommodating and kind. We realized after sitting that we probably didn't have enough time to eat and walk to our canal cruise, but the cook assured us that it would be quick. It was very quick and super delicious! The ‚Ä¶

Name: Pannenkoekenhuis Candela
Review Text: Tasty pancakes! We had one with bacon and one with Brie and they both were very delicious. The staff was friendly and helped by giving advice regarding what to order. ‚Ä¶

Name: Pannenkoekenhuis Candela
Review Text: This place was awesome. The service was great. They made space for us on their patio even though it wasn‚Äôt currently set up for guests. We weren‚Äôt sure how our waitress could possibly do the work of two people but then we realized there are ‚Ä¶

Name: Pannenkoekenhuis Candela
Review Text: Great pancakes with delicious and interesting flavour combinations! The goat cheese, walnut, honey was especially good. And very friendly service! Will definitely be back.

Name: Pannenkoekenhuis Candela
Review Text: The food was alright, but the staff was perhaps new. The waiter did not get one of the orders and it took almost one hour for them to make us pancakes. The food arrived at very different times, and one of us was finished eating when the last order came.

Name: Pannenkoekenhuis Candela
Review Text:
Extremely oder priced! Over 8‚Ç¨ for a pancake??!
The cake was good though and they have an outside area which is why they get 2 stars. ‚Ä¶

Name: Pannenkoekenhuis Candela
Review Text: Small and cozy place. It have a small area with toys and games for children!. In the back there is small terrace. You can find all kind of pannekoeken here and very tasty!. Get also nice ice cream or chocolate

Name: Pannenkoekenhuis Candela
Review Text: Best pancakes & chocolate in the area. Very child friendly & relaxed atmosphere. Lots of flavours & combinations still to discover.

Name: Pannenkoekenhuis Candela
Review Text: A super espceial site. The decoration and the details create a very cozy atmosphere with a very nice touch. The very unique products. We tried the salty pankakes and my god, a delight of flavors

Name: Pannenkoekenhuis Candela
Review Text:
Most finest restaurant in Amsterdam.
Amazing pancakes and delicious supplements. ‚Ä¶

Name: Pannenkoekenhuis Candela
Review Text: Super friendly staff! We went in with a group of 30, and they were able to accommodate all of us. Everything tasted amazing!  I suggest this place to anyone!

Name: Pannenkoekenhuis Candela
Review Text: Delicious pancakes! We tried one bacon and one cherry. Friendly service and lots of other good things (chocolates, etc.) Very reasonable prices too.

Name: Pannenkoekenhuis Candela
Review Text: Amazing pancakes and chocolate. Wonderful people and great service! Thank you from your Aussie friends :)

Name: Pannenkoekenhuis Candela
Review Text: The restaurant/cafe area is not very comfortable or cosy. The deco is very minimal. The food is very average and quite a few items in the menu were not available. Although the staff is friendly, the service is not very efficient.

Name: Pannenkoekenhuis Candela
Review Text: Great pancakes, sweet and savory, very pleasantly surprised after not many ratings and unsuspecting appearance. Will return!

Name: Pannenkoekenhuis Candela
Review Text:
Nice pancakes, small play area for kids,  nice people work there.

Only things my son's pancake was burned next time I hope will be better)

Name: Pannenkoekenhuis Candela
Review Text: Door was open, and the sign still said "We are open". However, after entering the shop, we were rudely told that it was actually closed and rushed out the door with no offer of explanation. We were very sad. Advertised hours were until 20:30, and we arrived at 18:00.

Name: Pannenkoekenhuis Candela
Review Text: Nice and quiet pancake place. Nice getaway from the mainstream loud places. Pancakes tasted the same as other places.

Name: Pannenkoekenhuis Candela
Review Text: Best pancakes I‚Äôve ever had. Recommend visiting a coffee shop first

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Passing through with my friends for a weekend in Amsterdam! We stumbled across this fabulous pancake factory! Very kind people added to that a delicious nutella banana pancake! ‚Ä¶

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Great pancakehouse. Come eat here if you are looking for an informal breakfast, brunch or lunch with some dutch heritage food! Really a must try when you visit Amsterdam. This place is also really fairly priced unlike ‚Ä¶

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Delicious! Gives both the typical Dutch pancakes, as well as American pancakes. I had a vegan apple pancake - only to be recommended! But also the normal pancakes taste very good. Gladly again! ‚Ä¶

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Candela is Amsterdam's hidden pancake pearl. Together with foreign friends we looked for a Dutch pancake restaurant in the center. Fortunately, we avoided hyper-commercial affairs where you get half an hour to work ‚Ä¶
